jobs.position: Senior Software Engineer (Digital Claims, Home and Property)
achievements: Utilized Agile/Scrum practices to deliver improved features based on customer feedback.
Led brand refresh for 4 React applications by making internal NPM packages for components.
Published internal NPM packages for retrying promises, JWT utilities, and A/B testing.
Created guided customer experiences for reporting stolen items and uploading documents.
Migrated data from internal MongoDB instances to DocumentDB in AWS to reduce costs by 60%.
Built accessible, mobile-first, and reusable React components and styles for use across 3 teams.
Optimized code and build configurations to reduce client bundle size by 80% for 5 applications.
Researched using AWS Fargate, API Gateway, and Lambdas with federated schemas for GraphQL.
Wrote unit tests for back end and front end applications using Jest and CodeceptJS.
Refactored GraphQL back end to use modernized REST services instead of SOAP services.
Mentored 3 junior engineers about CSS, React, TypeScript, and mobile-first development.
Prototyped and built an online learning application with EvoText, Inc. for Big Ideas Math.
Consulted for Endurance International Group to build web hosting registration in React.
Built a custom web-based drag-and-drop Coordinate Plane tool for WIN Learning Math.
Integrated and customized Learnosity assessments and reports for online courses.
Reviewed and provided feedback in pull requests on small and large engineering teams.
Designed and implemented the user interface for cross-platform web conferencing software.
Developed a web conferencing client with text chat and screen viewer for web browsers.
Provided technical support for web conferencing software over the phone, email, and chat.
